20101223022912.000|20101223022913.000|CC1|WEST WHERE RAIN, FLOODS, AND MUD
20101223022913.000|20101223022915.000|CC1|ARE THE HOLIDAY VISITORS THAT   
20101223022915.000|20101223022916.000|CC1|JUST WON'T LEAVE.               
20101223022916.000|20101223022919.000|CC1|SO HUNDREDS OF RESIDENTS HAVE   
20101223022919.000|20101223022921.000|CC1|BEEN FORCED TO, EVACUATING THEIR
20101223022921.000|20101223022922.000|CC1|HOMES UNDER THE THREAT OF RISING
20101223022922.000|20101223022923.000|CC1|WATERS, OR SLIDING MUD.         
20101223022923.000|20101223022926.000|CC1|TODAY'S STORM CAPS A FIVE-DAY   
20101223022926.000|20101223022927.000|CC1|DELUGE THAT HAS HIT SEVERAL     
20101223022927.000|20101223022928.000|CC1|WESTERN STATES.                 
20101223022928.000|20101223022930.000|CC1|RAIN CAME SO FAST AND SO OFTEN, 
20101223022930.000|20101223022932.000|CC1|SOME PLACES HAVE SEEN MORE THAN 
20101223022932.000|20101223022934.000|CC1|26 INCHES SINCE FRIDAY.

20101223022935.000|20101223022937.000|CC1|FOOTHILLS ABOVE LOS ANGELES.    
20101223022937.000|20101223022938.000|CC1|BILL, WHAT'S THE LATEST?

20101223022939.000|20101223022941.000|CC1|KATIE.

20101223022946.000|20101223022948.000|CC1|HAS DECLARED A STATE OF

20101223023357.000|20101223023358.000|CC1|YEARS, CUT PAYROLL TAXES FOR A

20101223023401.000|20101223023402.000|CC1|FOOD SAFETY BILL.               
20101223023402.000|20101223023404.000|CC1|>> SO I THINK IT'S FAIR TO SAY

20101223023508.000|20101223023510.000|CC1|>> NOW THE OLD POLICY REMAINS IN

20101223023514.000|20101223023514.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:35:00 of 1:00:00

20101223023909.000|20101223023909.000|CC1|      For people with COPD,     
20101223023909.000|20101223023912.000|CC1|  including chronic bronchPGitiÑ
20101223023912.000|20101223023913.000|CC1|       emphysema, or both,      
20101223023913.000|20101223023913.000|CC1|   ADVAIR helps significantly   
20101223023913.000|20101223023916.000|CC1|     improve lung function.     
20101223023916.000|20101223023918.000|CC1| While nothing can reverse COPD,
20101223023918.000|20101223023918.000|CC1|  ADVAIR is different from most 
20101223023918.000|20101223023920.000|CC1|     other COPD medications     
20101223023920.000|20101223023920.000|CC1|       because it contains      
20101223023920.000|20101223023923.000|CC1|    both an anti-inflammatory   
20101223023923.000|20101223023923.000|CC1|        and a long-acting       
20101223023923.000|20101223023925.000|CC1|         bronchodilator,        
20101223023924.000|20101223023924.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:39:00 of 1:00:00
20101223023925.000|20101223023925.000|CC1|        working together        
20101223023925.000|20101223023927.000|CC1|   to help you breathe better.  
20101223023927.000|20101223023927.000|CC1|ADVAIR won't replace fast-acting
20101223023927.000|20101223023930.000|CC1|  inhalers for sudden symptoms  
20101223023930.000|20101223023930.000|CC1|        and should not be       
20101223023930.000|20101223023932.000|CC1|   used more than twice a day.  
20101223023932.000|20101223023934.000|CC1| People with COPD taking ADVAIR 
20101223023934.000|20101223023934.000|CC1|    may have a higher chance    
20101223023934.000|20101223023936.000|CC1|          of pneumonia.         
20101223023936.000|20101223023936.000|CC1|       ADVAIR may increase
